entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.6°C

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
